# t-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                    | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (required) Link class          | `string`  | `''`    |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | (optional) Disabled link       | `boolean` | `false` |
| `href`        | `href`         | (optional) Link href           | `string`  | `''`    |
| `openNewTab`  | `open-new-tab` | (optional) Link open a new tag | `boolean` | `false` |
| `underline`   | `underline`    | (optional) Link underline      | `boolean` | `false` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | (optional) Link variant        | `string`  | `''`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                       |
| ------------------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `--link-align-items`           | Align items of the link           |
| `--link-color`                 | Color of the link                 |
| `--link-cursor`                | Cursor of the link                |
| `--link-display`               | Display of the link               |
| `--link-flex-direction`        | Flex direction of the link        |
| `--link-font-size`             | Font size of the link             |
| `--link-font-weight`           | Font weight of the link           |
| `--link-hover-with-underline`  | Color of the link variant primary |
| `--link-justify-content`       | Justify content of the link       |
| `--link-outline`               | Outline of the link               |
| `--link-padding`               | Padding of the link               |
| `--link-position`              | Position of the link              |
| `--link-text-decoration`       | Text decoration of the link       |
| `--link-variant-danger-color`  | Color of the link variant danger  |
| `--link-variant-info-color`    | Color of the link variant info    |
| `--link-variant-primary-color` | Color of the link variant primary |
| `--link-variant-success-color` | Color of the link variant success |
| `--link-variant-warning-color` | Color of the link variant warning |
